bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pharmaceutical Substance of the hard kernel in a fruit that contains the nutlet. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry rui he 蕤核： 主心腹邪結氣，明目 , “ Rui kernels . They control evil and bound qi in heart and abdomen, and clear the eyes”.

② Pathological Condition of swelling or strange items shaped like a kernel and developing anywhere on the body. Sometimes one has a sensation as if some passage were blocked by an item resembling a kernel. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry xuan shen 玄參：下水，止煩渴，散 頸下核 , “It drains water, ends vexation with thirst, and disperses kernels below the neck”.
